channel.title: Let's see how poorly I give feedback!
channel.description:
[quote="TheRealJFalc, post:150, topic:5518"] I think more people should do what @Alyen and @therealejoc are doing. I’m considering it myself but I’m horrible at giving feedback because I am almost always so amazed i can’t think of anything to improve usually xD [/quote]
Well, I think I should definitely try and do this. This will allow people who don't always get recognition to get some hopefully meaningful feedback on their songs. It will also help me improve my feedbacking capabilities.
Full profiles only, I'll be listening to them whenever I am able to. I am a full time student, so understand that xD

item.title: Let's see how poorly I give feedback!
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
Forum Member of the Week - Who wants to be involved?

I think more people should do what @Alyen and @therealejoc are doing. I’m considering it myself but I’m horrible at giving feedback because I am almost always so amazed i can’t think of anything to improve usually xD

Well, I think I should definitely try and do this. This will allow people who don’t always get recognition to get some hopefully meaningful feedback on their songs. It will also help me improve my feedbacking capabilities.

Full profiles only, I’ll be listening to them whenever I am able to. I am a full time student, so understand that xD

Read full topic
item.source: Let's see how poorly I give feedback!
